name: Hop Growers of America
goal: Hop Growers of America (HGA) provides oversight and coordination to hop growers in the United States, and supports the export of U.S. hops to markets around the world.  In 2016, the total value of hop products exported by the U.S. reached $250 million dollars, accounting for more than 40 percent of the worldâ€™s total supply of hops.
euInitiatives:
EU Pesticide and MRL Regulations and policies.
EU Food Safety Standards.
Minor Uses for Pesticides in the EU including the EU Commodity Expert Group (CEG) efforts.
